div.p: For my administration job it doesn’t really affect my life outside of work as, you know, you’re working Monday-Friday
and when you leave the office you don’t have to worry about anything else you just go home and do what you want to do
but obviously when you’re running your own business it doesn’t stop when you go home, people are constantly ringing, texting,
trying to make appointments and you have to think about the next best thing, think about any more training you need to go on
it’s just ongoing, it’s constant so it does have a bit of an effect on, you know, your life outside of work but my business is my priority at the moment.
